General.Name: TUL Corporation
General.Description: TUL Corporation develops and markets graphics computing solutions in IT industry worldwide. It offers gaming and embedded graphics cards, SoC motherboards and systems, FPGA products, thunderbolt devices, and other customized products and services, as well as genetic testing, data storage, and AI algorithm analysis services. The company was formerly known as C.P. Technologies and changed its name to TUL Corporation in March 2004. TUL Corporation was founded in 1997 and is based in New Taipei City, Taiwan.
General.Address: No.79, Xintai 5th Road, New Taipei City, Taiwan, 221
